metadata.title: CVE-2014-4510 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in job.cc in apt-cacher-ng 0.7.26allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted URL.

criterions.comment: apt-cacher-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
